intro: Thesium rasum, commonly known as the slender thesium, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Xanthorrhoeaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stem and small, pale yellow to greenish-yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in open, sandy soils in arid or semi-arid regions. Its leaves are linear and often covered in fine hairs, which help reduce water loss. Thesium rasum is often found in coastal areas and is adapted to withstand harsh environmental conditions.
